translation: I am Kratu; I am Yajna; I am the offering to the manes; I am the medicinal herbs and all plants; I am the Mantra; I am also the ghee or melted butter; I am the fire; I am the oblation.
commentary: 9.16 I I? Kratuá¸¥ sacrifice? I'm I? Yajnah the sacrifice? Svadha the offering to Pitris or ancestors? I'm I? I'm I? medicine the medicinal herbs and all plants? Mantra: sacred syllable? I'm I? I'm I? Eve also? Ajyam ghee or clarified butter? I'm I? Agni: the fire? I'm I? Hutam the offering.Commentary Kratu is a kind of Vedic sacrifice.Yajna is the worship enjoined in the Smriti or the holy books
